topic: Colors: 红色, 蓝色, 绿色, 黄色
detailedSummary: Basic colors in Chinese: hóng sè (red), lán sè (blue), lǜ sè (green), huáng sè (yellow), hēi sè (black), bái sè (white), huī sè (gray), zōng sè (brown), chéng sè (orange), fěn sè (pink).
whyItMatters: Mastering Colors: 红色, 蓝色, 绿色, 黄色 is essential for building a strong foundation in chinese - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
